document.full_text: power-hitting outfielder alfonso soriano was put on the 15-day disabled list tuesday with a strained left quadriceps muscle, the national league team said.
document.title: cubs outfielder soriano goes on disabled list
lines_and_colors: power-hitting outfielder alfonso soriano was put on the 15-day disabled list tuesday with a strained left quadriceps muscle, the national league team said.
